scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run watch:css" "npm run build:js -- --watch" "npm run watch:html" "npm run serve"
scripts.watch:css: npx nodemon --watch src/styles.css --exec "npm run build:css && npm run build:js"
scripts.watch:html: npx nodemon --watch dist/index.global.js --exec "cd .. && python3 claude-logger.py test-traffic.jsonl"
